document_name: NAN Capacity Building Project 72101 Project Document.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
The main outcomes of the project are:
1) To facilitate an efficient transfer of tasks and responsibilities from the federal government to new country governments including to the new countries (i.e. the Country of Curacao and the country of St. Maarten) andarchive data.
2) To develop capacity in te new countries for interacting with multi-lateral organizations. This will be developed through the training of civil servants in the Netherland Antilles
3) To conduct an assesment of the state of development in the five (50 islands of the Netherland Antilles through the preparation of an MDG report and the development of capacity for data management.

project_descr: Development of Capacity for Nation Building in the Netherland Antilles
project_title: Capacity Dev't for Nation  Building in NAN
